entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 21 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 30%
